QuestData.Title: A Harsh Reminder
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the front lines, outsider, where the wastelands and the jungle collide.$b$bWhen their forces forget about the ferocity of the Laughing Skull, this is where we come to make them remember.$b$bBy fierce and merciless destruction we survive. This is the way of Gorgrond.$b$bJoin in! Let us see if you can withstand the brutality of our land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa denizens of the wasteland in Affliction Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: I like killing things. And bones.
